home.title: McpHub
home.tagline: The Universal Standard for AI Integration
home.subtitle: Think of MCP as USB-C for AI applications - a standardized way to connect AI models with any data source or tool.

feature1.title: Easy Connection
feature1.description: Connect to MCP servers with just a few clicks

feature2.title: High Performance
feature2.description: Experience fast and reliable AI model execution

feature3.title: Open Standard
feature3.description: Built on the open Model Context Protocol standard

discover.title: Discover MCP Servers
discover.description: Browse and connect to a growing ecosystem of MCP servers

search.placeholder: Search for MCP servers by name, author, or tags...

hero.title: Getting Started with MCP
hero.subtitle: Start building and testing MCP connectors today with our comprehensive documentation and tools.

availability.title: Availability
availability.paragraph1: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) is designed to be universally compatible with various AI models and client applications, not just limited to a single provider.
availability.paragraph2: Multiple client applications support connecting to MCP servers, allowing you to enhance AI capabilities with access to your custom data, tools, and systems. You can use MCP to connect your internal systems and datasets to any compatible AI client.
availability.paragraph3: Developers can build and test MCP servers locally, and deploy production MCP servers that can serve entire organizations. The open protocol enables integration with various AI platforms and applications.

startUsing.title: Start Using
startUsing.subtitle: For end users and AI application users: If you're looking to enhance your AI experience with custom tools and data sources, explore these MCP-compatible clients.

claudeDesktop.title: Claude Desktop
claudeDesktop.description: Connect to MCP servers directly from your Claude Desktop app. Supports both local and remote MCP servers.

vsCodeExtension.title: VS Code Extension
vsCodeExtension.description: Connect directly to MCP servers from your VS Code environment for enhanced coding assistance.

jetbrainsPlugin.title: JetBrains IDE Plugin
jetbrainsPlugin.description: Use MCP servers within JetBrains IDEs like IntelliJ, PyCharm, and others to enhance your development experience.

startBuilding.title: Start Building
startBuilding.subtitle: For developers: Choose the development path that matches your goals - build MCP servers to extend AI capabilities or integrate MCP into your client applications.

customServers.title: Build Custom Servers
customServers.description: Create servers that connect your data sources, tools, and APIs to MCP-compatible AI models.

serverSDK.title: Server SDK
serverSDK.description: Use our SDK to implement the MCP specification and build servers that connect to various client applications.

serverTemplates.title: Server Templates
serverTemplates.description: Start with pre-built templates for common use cases like document retrieval, database connectivity, and tool use.

clientSDK.title: Client SDK
clientSDK.description: Implement MCP in your AI applications to enable connectivity with a wide range of MCP servers and tools.

integrationGuide.title: Integration Guide
integrationGuide.description: Learn how to integrate MCP connectivity into your AI-powered applications, platforms, and interfaces.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Join our open-source community and contribute to improving MCP clients and implementations.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join our growing community of developers building the future of AI integration with MCP.
